document.full_text: mitre went to the brewers for a minor league outfielder, ensuring that ivan nova, freddy garcia and bartolo colon will make the opening day roster. millwood will start in class aaa.
document.title: yankees trade sergio mitre and sign kevin millwood
lines_and_colors: mitre went to the brewers for a minor league outfielder, ensuring that ivan nova, freddy garcia and bartolo colon will make the opening day roster. millwood will start in class aaa.
